Class SortByTypeEnumProperties | Methods | Constants
 
Packagecom.brightcove.brightaction.api
Classpublic class SortByTypeEnum
InheritanceSortByTypeEnum AbstractEnum

The field by which to sort the results. A SortByType: One of PUBLISH_DATE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, PLAYS_TOTAL, PLAYS_TRAILING_WEEK
